Changes.LogName: Add event in Willy Fish Shop

Entries: I just fumbled through some ol' stuffs down here.
You came at the right time, I'd like you to have this @.
You can make some fine neck wear from the shells scatterin around the beach.
And maybe give em to someone you fancy. $3
